GSD.product_version: versions from v3.11 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_net_busy_poll.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit 05d92723f99cf5c15ae74cc196193c2dbaa9a12c, it was introduced in version v3.11 by commit 060212928670593fb89243640bf05cf89560b023. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_net_busy_poll.
